title: TaxSlayer - E-file 2015 taxes
description:
TaxSlayer Go - Taxes Made Easy. Wherever You Are. 100% Secure. 100% Guaranteed*. IRS Approved. FAST, SECURE, AND ALWAYS ACCURATE!
File your simple tax return the fastest and easiest was possible in almost no time at all. Leave the hard parts to TaxSlayer and be on your way to the maximum tax refund…guaranteed!

File your Federal and State tax return today!
- Enter some basic information about yourself and your dependents
- Scan your driver's license for quick entry
- Add your W-2 income
- File your tax return
- Affordable Care Act support
- Deduct your fees from your federal tax refund (small fee may apply)**

Join millions of satisfied TaxSlayer customers and get your 
refund fast! 

Calculations Guaranteed.

Powered by nationally recognized tax software TaxSlayer.com

*See our Maximum Refund Guarantee at http://www.taxslayer.com/Links/MaxRefundGuarantee
**$5 fee will apply
short_desc: TaxSlayer - E-file Your 2015 Taxes. Quick and Easy.100% Secure.
